content: type to enter a caption beanie lines lately i have been in love with making hats this is just one that has been playing around in my head simple knit purl stitches and an easy knit three together through the back loop decrease section this is a one size fits all type of hat given that ribbing runs throughout the pattern it conforms to the head i hope you enjoy making this hat as much as i enjoy creating them materials needed i used less than one skein of malabrigo rios 210yds/192m colors used were camel and purpuras four stitch markers one 16in size 8us/5mm needle spare size 8us/5mm 32in needles magic loop or if you wish to use double pointed needles for the decrease section gauge 23 sts /28 row = 4in in rib pattern long tail cast on 88 stitches stitch count will not change until you reach section 6 decrease section being careful not to twist the stitches and using one st markers for bor join in the round section 1 row 1 purl one knit one to end of row repeat this row five more times six row total section 2 row 1 knit one purl one to end of row repeat this row six more times seven row total section 3 purl one knit one to end of row repeat this row seven more times eight row total section 4 knit one purl one to end of row repeat this row eight more times nine row total section 5 purl one knit one to end of row repeat the row nine more times ten row total section 6 decrease section you will be placing 3 markers on the next row to set up up for the decreasing row 1 knit one purl one for twenty two stitches using a different color marker than the bor marker pm repeat twice more k1 p1 for the remaining 22 sts row 2 knit 3tog through the back loop purl one knit one until you come to the next marker sm knit 3tog through back loop purl one knit one repeat twice more 8 sts decreased you will repeat row 2 of the decrease section 9 times total you will have 16 stitches left on you needles changing to double points or magic loop when there are too few sts to work comfortably final bind off when you have 16 sts left cut yarn using a tapestry needle thread remaining 16 sts on to needle pull tight and seam any loose ends enjoy type to enter a
